name: Devil Dongers (Harry OConnor)
description:
Devil Dongers was part of a 40 hour game jam, done by a team of three students. Inspired by both Doom and Devil Daggers, your goal is to fight waves of the undead that are out to get you. Now your only problem is.... They're invisible.

Use your sonar ability to a short glimpse of enemy locations, but then it's up to you.

Team:

Harry O'Connor

Liam Harvey

Luke Wilmot

Inspired by both Doom and Devil Daggers, your goal is to fight the hoards of undead that are out to get you. Only problem is... They're Invisible.

Use your sonar ability to gain short glimpses of enemy locations, but then it's up to you.
